comment: This is idiotic. It's just amazing the amount of misinformation that's out there. The idea that you're better off w Covid than the vaccine is just ... conspiracy-theory-level unhinged.
amr:

                              :ARG3 (m3 / more)

            :mod (l / level
                  :mod (c2 / conspiracy))

comment: I would advise you to consult your PCP for their opinion. In my case (admittedly we are both over ), he and I have both been vaccinated. He received his as soon as he could back in December.
